title: Bug 49536 - HTTP code 200 OK returned with no content instead of 404 when accessing a URL without any deployed webapps
description: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, the server returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an expected HTTP error 404. I downloaded Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip. This issue can be replicated by following the steps below:
OB: When I access a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed, the server returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When I access a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip. 
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed. 
3. Access any URL on the Tomcat server. 
Expected: The server should return an HTTP error 404. 
Actual: The server returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
